title: Abbie Chatfield shares a makeup-free selfie, as she flaunts her ample cleavage
text:
She's reportedly found love with The Bachelorette runner-up Todd King.

And on Monday, Bachelor runner-up Abbie Chatfield looked happier than ever as she flaunted her ample cleavage in a skimpy orange plaid Lahan bikini.

Taking to Instagram to share the snap, the 24-year-old reality star showed off her natural complexion in a makeup-free selfie.

Dare to bare! Abbie Chatfield (pictured) left little to the imagination as she flaunted her cleavage with makeup-free selfie on Monday

The reality star playfully lifted her arms for the happy snap, showcasing her incredible figure.

'Bed head,' she captioned the snap.

Fans quick to also praise the reality star with one commenting on Instagram: 'What a goddess! Your hair is absolutely gorgeous curly and out. You're looking happy.'

Fans quick to also praise the reality star with one commenting on Instagram: 'What a goddess! Your hair is absolutely gorgeous curly and out. You're looking happy.'

It comes Abbie and her new beau Todd recently confirmed their romance with a very public beach date after being the subject of dating rumours for weeks.

In photos published by New Idea magazine, the couple can be seen frolicking on the beach together in Noosa, Queensland.

Abbie and Todd first sparked romance rumours last month when they exchanged flirty comments on Instagram.

It's on! Abbie and Todd (pictured on The Bachelorette) were pictured canoodling at the beach in Noosa, Queensland recently

According to New Idea, the property analyst has been telling friends about her relationship but wants to keep it low key.

'I am dating someone, but I can't say who it is,' she apparently told a pal.

After Todd defended Abbie against sexist trolls, she replied with: 'Send me a date card already, you feminist icon.'
description: She's reportedly found love with The Bachelorette runner-up Todd King.
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
